title: [UX] Group parallel tool calls of same type (e.g., 'read(3 files)')

logs.msg: Format: • read(3 files) with ⎿ per file underneath. Shows batching while keeping files scannable.

Approach: Track pending tool call IDs by type. When ToolCallStart arrives, check if previous entry is same tool type without results. If so, update count. Requires adding parallel_calls: HashMap<String, Vec<String>> to MessageList. Deferring - more impactful tasks first.
